name: Dead Man's Pass
description:
- Does not work in Safari -

This game uses the color palette and resolution of the original GameBoy. The bombs progressively drop faster - to see true chaos, type the cheat code 2124 while in the main game, where they drop once every 0.1 seconds.  Music by Fireteko (TheCHONK).

Controls:

Left click or space (on ground) - jump

Left click or space (in air) - dive

- Made for the 2021.2 Brackey's Game Jam -
